title: Soul Secret - Flowing Portrais (2008 Prog Metal)
description:
written by label ProgRock Records:

Flowing Portraits is Soul Secret\&#039;s debut album. Recorded and mixed at Orange Bug Studios (Naples, IT) during 2007, it features six original songs clocking in at 60 minutes. The mastering was done by Threshold\&#039;s guitarist Karl Groom who has produced bands like Threshold, Edenbridge, Dragonforce, Arena, Pendragon. The vocals have been recorded by ex-Mind Key lead singer Mark Basile. The album is a melting pot of prog-rock and metal, passing through heavy guitar riffs, stunning keyboard solos, great instrumental sections, acoustic moments like \"Regrets\" and symphonic ones like \"Tears of Kalliroe\", a 17-minutes epic suite featuring an orchestral overture. 

Ripped using EAC and FLAC\&#039;ed L8

Tracklist:

1 Dance Of The Waves
2 First Creature
3 Inner War
4 Learning to Lose
5 Regrets
6 Tears of Kalliroe


Enjoy
